How to Use This Currency Converter?
 Note: this currency converter is designed to use live exchange rate:
 Step 1. Select the currencies you wish to convert from and convert to.
 Step 2. Enter the amount you want to convert in the provided input field.
 Step 3. Click the Convert button, the converted amount will display based on real time.

Search and save flights.
 1) Enter the IATA airport code of the desired flight in the search bar
 2) Press "Save" to save flight
 3) Delete any flights
 4) Show flight / saved flight
 5) Show flights options show details any saved flights
Must enter valid IATA airport code (3 letters)
